title: Najwa's Chicken Korma
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '2 to 4 cinnamon sticks', '10 whole cloves', '10 cardamom pods', '1 onion, thinly sliced', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '2 skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets', '1/2 teaspoon salt, or to taste', '1 teaspoon dried crushed chillies', '1 teaspoon ground coriander', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '100g (4 oz) passata', '100ml (4 fl oz) warm water', '100ml (4 fl oz) buttermilk', 'handful chopped fresh parsley']
